headline: The Power of the Pen - 3M Scientist Supports Scholarship for Next Generation of Innovators
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESSWIRE / December 4, 2024 / 3M Originally published on 3M News Center Anya Ellis took an interest in STEM at an early age. "I remember saving money from a lemonade stand to buy my first microscope and examine insects on slides," ...

headline: Dow 30 December Dogs Show 28 Pay Dividends And 1 "Safer" Buy
summary: While most of this collection of Dow Industrials is too pricey and reveals only skinny dividends, one of the ten lowest priced Dogs of the Dow is ready to buy. Read on to find out which one.
